title: Maha civic polls: BJP dominates, AIMIM expands, Cong finds foothold - 5 key takeaways
content: The BJP-led Mahayuti alliance secured a decisive victory in the Maharashtra civic elections 2026, including the BMC polls, across 27 civic bodies. Key takeaways highlight the BJP's dominance under Devendra Fadnavis, the erosion of the Thackeray legacy, and the fizzling out of Ajit Pawar's political maneuvers. The Congress showed a minor resurgence, while AIMIM made notable inroads in urban pockets.

title: Maharashtra civic polls: Fadnavis, Thackerays & Pawars - top 10 winners & losers
content: Maharashtra's civic elections saw a significant political shift as the BJP-led Mahayuti alliance secured a dominant victory, particularly in Mumbai's BMC. Devendra Fadnavis and the BJP celebrated substantial gains, ending Shiv Sena's long-held control. Uddhav Thackeray's Sena and the Congress faced major setbacks, while Raj Thackeray's MNS and Sharad Pawar's NCP also saw diminished influence.

title: Zuckerberg hired Wang for $14bn, now they're clashing
content: Meta's new structure reveals tension between Mark Zuckerberg and Alexandr Wang, the $14 billion AI recruit. Wang finds Zuckerberg's micromanagement stifling, while staff question his leadership for Meta's AI ambitions. A recent strategy clash highlighted differing priorities, with Wang pushing for cutting-edge AI over immediate product integration.

title: RCB remain unbeaten with dominant win over Gujarat Giants
content: Royal Challengers Bengaluru achieved their third consecutive victory in the Women's Premier League. They defeated Gujarat Giants by 32 runs. A significant partnership between Radha Yadav and Richa Ghosh bolstered RCB's score. Shreyanka Patil delivered a stellar bowling performance, taking five wickets. This win solidifies RCB's strong position in the tournament.

title: X outage: Musk‚Äôs Twitter goes down for second time in three days
content: X, formerly Twitter, experienced a significant global outage on Friday, January 16, marking the second disruption in three days. Users worldwide faced issues accessing posts, photos, and videos, with a majority reporting app problems.  This latest technical fault adds to a string of disruptions affecting the platform recently, leaving many unable to connect.

title: Nvidia CEO advocates zero coding for engineers; this is what he wants them to do instead
content: Nvidia's CEO Jensen Huang aims for engineers to code zero percent, leveraging AI assistants like Cursor to tackle complex, undiscovered problems. He believes this 'Purpose vs Task' approach, akin to radiology's evolution, will elevate human roles. While some, like Cursor's CEO, caution against unchecked AI development, Huang remains confident in this human-centric future for innovation.

title: Maha civic polls: BJP trolls Raj Thackeray with order of 'rasmalai', Annamalai serves jab
content: In a light-hearted twist following the BJP's victory in the Maharashtra civic elections, MP PC Mohan cheekily took a dig at Raj Thackeray by referencing 'rajmalai'. This comes on the heels of Thackeray‚Äôs playful jab at K Annamalai, calling him 'rasmalai' during a spirited debate on Mumbai's essence.

title: ‚ÄòIt is none of her business‚Äô: Priya Sachdev plea slammed by Sunjay Kapur‚Äôs sister
content: Priya Sachdev Kapur has approached the Supreme Court seeking divorce documents from Sunjay Kapur and Karisma Kapoor's marriage. This move is seen by Sunjay's sister, Mandhira Kapur Smith, as a deliberate distraction from the ongoing Rs 30,000 crore estate dispute and allegations of a forged will.

title: Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt's heartfelt life update amid team's tough season
content: The Kansas City Chiefs had a pretty disappointing season this time, but the billionaire heiress, Gracie Hunt, has always been there for the team. Amid all the mess, Gracie Hunt has made a wholesome post about her life along with a few inspirational words that has moved fans. With the team's poor performance, many of their players are also getting trolled brutally.

title: Tom Brady admits divorce with Gisele weighed on his final NFL season
content: Tom Brady admitted his divorce from Gisele B√ºndchen made his final NFL season emotionally draining. Speaking openly on The Herd, he said personal struggles affected his ability to play and helped him realize retirement was the right choice. After 23 seasons, Brady felt complete and chose to step away to focus on his children and life beyond football.

title: Travis Kelce sparks tension with Taylor Swift amid post-football life stress
content: Taylor Swift is reportedly concerned about Travis Kelce‚Äôs emotional well-being as he considers retirement from the NFL. Insiders say football has long defined Kelce‚Äôs identity, making the transition difficult. While opportunities await beyond the game, the uncertainty has created stress. Kelce has acknowledged the challenge publicly while evaluating his physical readiness and future.

title: Raptors weigh big deadline moves as RJ Barrett, Quickley hit trade talks
content: The Toronto Raptors face a trade deadline dilemma, balancing contention with rebuilding.  Discussions for Domantas Sabonis with the Kings are stalled due to salary concerns, while the Raptors explore packages involving RJ Barrett and Immanuel Quickley.  A potential four-team deal could send Sabonis to Toronto, with other assets moving to Sacramento.

title: Iyer and Bishnoi drafted into India T20I squad as Sundar and Tilak miss series
content: Washington Sundar has been ruled out of the T20I series against New Zealand due to a side strain, with Ravi Bishnoi named as his replacement. Shreyas Iyer also joins the squad for the first three T20Is, replacing the injured Tilak Varma. Iyer brings significant T20I and IPL experience to the Indian team.

title: Nick Fuentes slams Candace Owens over Charlie Kirk 'time travel' claims
content: Nick Fuentes criticized Candace Owens after she claimed Charlie Kirk was a time traveler and used ancient technology. Fuentes called her ideas ‚Äútotally insane‚Äù during his livestream. Owens also said Kirk spoke to her in dreams and accused Turning Point USA members of betrayal. The claims have sparked heavy online criticism and debate.

title: 'Unacceptable': Denmark star questions India's readiness for World Championships; post goes viral
content: Danish shuttler Mia Blichfeldt has strongly criticized the hygiene at the Indira Gandhi Sports Complex, calling conditions "unacceptable" after bird droppings disrupted matches at the India Open.  Despite BWF assurances, she doubts the venue's readiness for the World Championships, citing ongoing issues with animals and cleanliness impacting player focus and fairness.

title: Maha civic polls: CM Fadnavis credits Hindutva for big win; BJP set to name 25 mayors
content: The BJP-led Mahayuti has achieved a significant victory in Maharashtra's municipal elections. Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis credited the win to the party's development agenda. The alliance secured a majority in numerous municipal corporations, including the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation. This outcome reflects public trust in Prime Minister Modi's leadership and the alliance's focus on governance and infrastructure projects.

title: ‚ÄòThank you Maharashtra!‚Äô PM Modi hails civic poll results; congratulates NDA workers
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi congratulated BJP workers and thanked Maharashtra's people for the NDA and Mahayuti's sweeping victory in municipal corporation elections. Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis attributed the success to a development-focused agenda, highlighting the alliance's strong performance, particularly in the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation.

title: Did Israel stop Trump's Iran strike? Mossad chief in US - why it signals bigger attack in works
content: Mossad chief David Barnea visited the US for talks on Iran, following a call between Trump and Netanyahu. Israel requested a delay on military action, citing concerns about retaliation and the effectiveness of proposed strikes. Meanwhile, US military assets are being deployed to the region as diplomatic channels remain open.

title: Sanjay Dutt buys new luxury car worth Rs 50 lakh; spotted on streets of Mumbai
content: Sanjay Dutt adds Tesla Cybertruck (Rs 50 lakh) to his luxury garage, spotted zooming Mumbai streets. The stainless-steel beast packs steer-by-wire, massive screens, and towing power. US price: $80K+. Recently shone in Prabhas' The Raja Saab and Ranveer Singh's hit Dhurandhar.

title: From savers to investors: What Indian households are doing with their money?
content: Indian households are shifting from traditional savings like gold and cash to market-linked investments such as mutual funds and equities. This trend, accelerated by digital access and financial literacy, sees a significant rise in individual investors, particularly younger demographics and women, seeking inflation-beating returns.

title: Mumbai BMC election results 2026: Uddhav Thackeray's Shiv Sena's 30-year control collapses
content: Early trends indicate the Mahayuti alliance, led by BJP and Eknath Shinde's Shiv Sena, is poised to end the Shiv Sena (UBT)'s 30-year dominance in the BMC. The alliance is leading in over 110 wards, with BJP showing significant strength. Similar trends are observed in Pune, where BJP is displacing the Pawars.

title: Pakistan's Babar furious at Steve Smith in BBL; video goes viral - Watch
content: Babar Azam was left furious during a BBL match when teammate Steve Smith refused a simple run to keep strike in the Power Surge. The incident occurred in the 11th over and went viral. Smith later smashed a record 32-run over and scored 100. Babar was dismissed soon after in frustration, but the Sixers won comfortably, with Smith named Player of the Match.

title: India gets its 92nd GM: No coach, single father‚Äôs grind, and a dream vs Gukesh
content: Aaryan Varshney became India‚Äôs 92nd chess Grandmaster at 21, guided entirely by his father Gaurav, a single parent since Aaryan was five. With no coach, academies, or foreign training, Gaurav trained him at home using game analysis and ChessBase. Overcoming pandemic hurdles, Aaryan rose rapidly and now dreams of becoming a World Champion.

title: Mahindra XUV 3XO electric vs Tata Nexon: Subcompact EV comparison
content: As mentioned before, the Nexon EV gets two battery pack options - 30kWh and 45kWh. Powering both variants is a front-mounted electric motor that delivers 145 hp and 215 nm. The 38kWh version offers an ARAI-certified range of 325km, while the 45kWh version provides a range of 489km on a full charge.

title: $180bn and counting: Why US arms Israel like no other; the ultimate defence pact decoded
content: Israel's decades-long deep reliance on US military, diplomatic, and political backing is being re-examined. Prime Minister Netanyahu's call to taper US aid to zero within a decade signals a shift towards strategic self-reliance, amidst growing US involvement in Israel's war decisions and evolving American public opinion.

title: Maha civic polls: Mahayuti surge dents Thackeray camps; Cong falters - highlights
content: The Mahayuti alliance, comprising BJP and Shiv Sena, has secured a dominant performance in Maharashtra's local body elections, leading in key municipal corporations including Mumbai, Pune, and Nagpur. This victory is being hailed as a mandate for Prime Minister Modi's policies and nationalism, with opposition parties like Shiv Sena (UBT), NCP, and Congress facing significant setbacks.

title: ‚ÄòShort on cricket‚Äô: India coach explains Rohit's quiet ODI run amid Kohli surge
content: While Virat Kohli shines with consecutive fifties, Rohit Sharma faces scrutiny in the ongoing ODI series. Assistant coach Ryan ten Doeschate attributes Sharma's recent modest scores to challenging pitch conditions and a lack of recent match practice, emphasising his team-first approach and overall strong ODI record.

title: Capital chokes: GRAP-III reimposed in Delhi-NCR; air quality likely to turn 'severe'
content: Delhi-NCR faces renewed pollution crisis as authorities re-implement GRAP-III restrictions. Non-essential construction, demolition, and mining activities are halted. Vehicular curbs target older diesel and petrol models. Essential services and critical projects are exempted, with schools offering hybrid learning. This move aims to combat the 'severe' air quality forecast.

title: ‚ÄòLeave by any means available‚Äô: India keeps close watch on Iran amid escalating tensions
content: The Ministry of External Affairs has urged around 9,000 Indian citizens, primarily students in Iran, to depart the country due to recent developments. Advisories have been issued for both those in Iran and those planning to travel there. India is actively monitoring the situation and preparing to assist citizens wishing to return home.

title: Latur: Cong wins LMC polls with 43 of 70 seats; BJP settles for 22
content: Congress is leading in the Latur Municipal Corporation elections, ahead of the BJP in early trends. This closely watched contest unfolds amidst Maharashtra's ongoing civic polls, where the ruling alliance has shown strong performance. The LMC results follow a tight race in 2017, with the BJP then emerging as the largest party.

title: Stock market open on Sunday for Budget 2026! BSE, NSE release schedule for Feb 1 - see details
content: Stock markets will observe a rare Sunday trading session on February 1, allowing investors immediate reaction to the Union Budget 2026-27. Both BSE and NSE announced full-day trading, with pre-open from 9 am to 9:08 am and regular trading from 9:15 am to 3:30 pm.

title: Mustafizur row: 'I've received death threats'- Bangladesh players' chief speaks out
content: Bangladesh Cricketers‚Äô Welfare Association president Mohammad Mithun faces death threats after advocating for players subjected to derogatory remarks.  He insists his actions are solely for player welfare, especially with the T20 World Cup approaching.  Mithun expressed shock at the threats, emphasizing his commitment to player rights and national interest, not politics.

title: 'Ramayana is Hindu, I'm...': AR Rahman on doing music for Ranbir Kapoor, Sai Pallavi starreer
content: AR Rahman discusses his collaboration with Hans Zimmer for Nitesh Tiwari's 'Ramayana,' highlighting his respect for Hindu mythology despite being Muslim. He emphasizes the epic's moral core and the importance of seeking wisdom universally. Rahman sees the project as a global message of love, uniting diverse backgrounds.

title: Watch: Dramatic video shows IDF Black Hawk crashing after harness tore mid-lift; no injuries reported
content: A Black Hawk helicopter, known as the Yanshuf, crashed while being airlifted after an emergency landing earlier this week due to severe weather in Gush Etzion. The harness reportedly tore mid-lift, causing the helicopter to fall near a house. No injuries were reported, and an investigation has been ordered.

title: A historic Indiana or the restored U -- who has the edge in the CFP title game?
content: Will the Hoosiers cap an undefeated season, or can the Canes pull off a stunner? Here are the keys to the game.

title: Sources: Mets, Bichette reach 3-year, $126M deal
content: After missing out on Kyle Tucker, the Mets have agreed to a three-year, $126 million contract with Bo Bichette, sources confirmed to ESPN.

title: Lowe to Angels, Lux to Rays in three-team trade
content: The Rays have sent outfielder Josh Lowe to the Angels as part of a three-team trade in which left-handed reliever Brock Burke went from Los Angeles to Cincinnati and infielder Gavin Lux moved from Cincinnati to Tampa Bay.

title: Ballmer aims to dismiss fraud suit over Kawhi pay
content: Attorneys representing Steve Ballmer are seeking to dismiss a lawsuit that alleges the LA Clippers owner participated in a fraud by funneling money to star Kawhi Leonard through a now-defunct green banking company.

title: Dodgers strike again, land Tucker, sources say
content: The World Series champion Dodgers added another big bat to an already-potent lineup Thursday night, agreeing to a four-year, $240 million deal with prized free agent Kyle Tucker, sources told ESPN.

title: Dozens charged with college hoops point shaving
content: A college basketball point-shaving scheme involving more than 39 players on 17 teams resulted in dozens of games in the previous two seasons being fixed by a gambling ring that included a former NBA player, according to a federal indictment.

title: Vandy LB among 5 denied injunction for 5th year
content: Five college football players seeking to play a fifth season this fall had their motions for a preliminary injunction denied Thursday by a federal judge.

title: Rose Lavelle named U.S. women's player of year
content: Gotham FC and United States women's national team midfielder Rose Lavelle has been voted U.S. Soccer's Female Player of the Year for 2025.

title: Nacua's brother won't be charged after taking car
content: Samson Nacua, the brother of Rams wide receiver Puka Nacua, will not be charged after he was arrested last month for allegedly taking a vehicle without the owner's consent, with investigators now telling ABC7 that they believe it was accidental.

title: üèà 2026 NFL draft: Field Yates' top 25 prospects
content: Who are the best players in this year's NFL draft class? Which receivers have first-round talent? Field Yates stacks his top 25 board.

title: Inside Mike Tomlin spent his final day as the Steelers head coach
content: 'It was dead silent' when the coach stunned the Steelers' locker room. Here's what we know about what's next.

title: Everything you need to know for all four NFL divisional games: Score picks, predictions and storylines
content: Bills-Broncos. 49ers-Seahawks. Texans-Patriots. Rams-Bears. We have picks, stats to know and more for the divisional round games.

title: How can four underdogs pull off upsets?
content: Could we see surprises? Let's find matchup advantages and X factors for the Bills, Bears, Texans and 49ers.

title: Giannis and the Bucks: Four possible pathways forward in Milwaukee at the deadline
content: The Bucks and Antetokounmpo currently sit in 11th place ahead of the trade deadline. What are their options?

title: Men's: Duke is a 1-seed again
content: Is the ACC back? Eight single-digit seeds -- including one on the top line -- and a couple of bubble teams would suggest so.

title: Women's: South Carolina ascends to No. 2 overall
content: Texas, which fell at South Carolina on Thursday, tumbles to the final No. 1 seed after its second straight loss.

title: Wetzel: Accused hoops schemers were not victims of a changing society
content: These players selfishly betrayed their common sense, their teammates and, ultimately, themselves, Wetzel says.

title: 'This was too easy': Inside six college basketball games the feds allege were rigged
content: Prosecutors allege a gambling ring bribed 39 NCAA players to fix dozens of games. Here's a closer look.

title: How Darnold-to-Smith-Njigba fuels Seahawks' playoff run
content: The duo connects to overcome past narratives, powers Seattle to home-field advantage in NFC divisional round.

title: How the Bears, Caleb Williams became an offensive juggernaut
content: Ben Johnson helped build one of the most explosive offenses in the NFL in Chicago. Here's how he did it.

title: Ranking the USMNT's top 15 prospects age 21 or younger, from Europe to MLS
content: As the USMNT's 2026 begins, we rank the U21 American players on the national team radar. From Europe to MLS, here's the top 15.

title: Rising prices, plenty of QBs and 1,200 players without a home
content: The transfer portal closes today for most players. Here are five things to know after two wild weeks.

title: ESPN's 2025 All-America team: The top players at every position
content: From Fernando Mendoza and Jeremiyah Love to Jacob Rodriguez and Rueben Bain Jr., here are the best of the best.

title: How NFL players prepare for the coldest games of the year
content: Even as beards freeze and fingers lose feeling, NFL players find ways to handle ridiculously cold temperatures.

title: Bo Bichette provides Mets with a much-needed offseason win
content: Track all the latest MLB free agency and trade news with fantasy baseball analysis from Tristan H. Cockcroft and Eric Karabell.

title: Who to bet to win Super Bowl 60: Our picks after one round of the playoffs
content: Who are we betting to win the Super Bowl? Our analysts broke down the odds and the team's performances to find answers.

title: Betting buzz: Any AFC team could go to the Super Bowl -- and the odds show it
content: One team could be one of the longest favorites, while another could be one of the shortest long shots.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United eye Hackney and Murillo, Maguire to leave?
content: Nottingham Forest center back Murillo and Middlesbrough midfielder Hayden Hackney are on Michael Carrick's shortlist at Manchester United. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: Transfer window weekly: G√ºler to Arsenal? Chelsea squad changes?
content: The winter transfer window is open, so what are our reporters hearing about deals that could be done?

title: Weekend preview: Madrid seek redemption, Manchester derby, AFCON final
content: It's Friday and another full weekend of action awaits across the soccer calendar as Julien Laurens picks out the best games to watch in Europe.

title: Rating Boozer, Dybantsa and 54 more freshmen
content: The 56 standouts, surprises and more of a historic freshman class, starting with Cameron Boozer and AJ Dybantsa.

title: Victor Wembanyama, Keldon Johnson shaved each other's heads following loss to OKC
content: Spurs center Victor Wembanyama and forward Keldon Johnson showed up to shoot around on Thursday with bald heads.

title: Keep, cut or add? What to do with these eight rising and falling players
content: Steve Alexander highlights fantasy basketball names trending upward or downward, and explains whether they should be added or cut from your roster.

title: "Inseparable From Laureate": Nobel Body After Machado Gifts Medal To Trump
content: The Nobel Peace Prize remains inseparably linked to the person or organisation designated as the laureate, the Norwegian Nobel Committee said on Friday, one day after last year's winner gave part of her award to U.S. President Donald Trump.

title: India Won't Leave Iran's Chabahar Port, Works With US For Middle Path: Sources
content: As the clock ticks down to the expiry of the US sanctions waiver on India's operations at Iran's Chabahar Port, New Delhi is engaged in quiet but intensive negotiations with Washington to protect what it sees as a strategic and connectivity asset.

title: 'Non-Hindu Prohibited Area' Boards Put Up In Haridwar's Har Ki Pauri
content: Amid demands to declare the Haridwar Kumbh area in Uttarakhand a Hindu zone and restrict entry to non-Hindus at all religious places and Ganga ghats within it, signs reading 'Non-Hindu prohibited area' were put up at Har Ki Pauri on Friday.

title: Republic Day Parade Enclosures Named After Indian Rivers "To End VIP Culture"
content: Ahead of Republic Day celebrations, Defence Secretary Rajesh Kumar Singh on Friday announced a move to end the "VIP culture" during the annual parade at Kartavya Path, as they would now be named after Indian rivers.

title: "Mother Of All Deals": Piyush Goyal On India-EU Trade Agreement
content: Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal on Friday said the free trade agreement between India and the 27-nation bloc EU, the negotiations for which are at the last leg, will be the "mother of all deals".

title: AI Video Of Aircraft Landing At Railway Station Causes Scare
content: A viral video purportedly showing a passenger aircraft making an "emergency landing" at Jabalpur railway station caused a brief scare, but officials quickly dismissed the clip as AI-generated.

title: Indore Mayor Drinks Tap Water Days After Contamination Kills 15
content: Indore Mayor Pushyamitra Bhargava on Friday drank tap water in Bhagirathpura amid the water contamination tragedy in the area.

title: BMC Election Results LIVE: BJP-Shiv Sena Alliance Ahead In 117 Wards
content: BMC Election Results LIVE: The Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP)-led Mahayuti alliance is headed for a big victory in the state's municipal elections which were held on Thursday. Counting of votes started at 10 am Friday.

title: BJP, Sena Ahead In BMC Polls, Thackerays To Lose Grip On Richest Civic Body
content: The BJP-led alliance is headed for a victory in the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) elections as the Thackerays lose grip on Mumbai's civic body after 25 years, with votes still being counted in 29 civic bodies across Maharashtra.

title: From Giving It To Nazis To Selling It: When Nobel Laureates Gave Up Medals
content: In an unexpected move, Venezuelan opposition leader Maria Corina Machado presented her Nobel Peace Prize to US President Donald Trump during a meeting at the White House on Thursday.

title: 16-Year-Old Stripped And Paraded Naked For 1.5 km By Girl's Family In Ujjain
content: An incident highlighting mob justice and public humiliation has sparked outrage in Madhya Pradesh's Ujjain, after a 16-year-old boy was allegedly stripped naked, tied with ropes, and paraded for approximately 1.5 km by members of a girl's family.

title: Meritorious Reserved Candidates Entitled to Open Category Seats: Top Court
content: The Supreme Court on Friday said that candidates from reserved categories who secure higher marks than the general category cutoff must be adjusted against unreserved seats.

title: Mamata Banerjee Lays Foundation For World's Tallest Mahakal Shiva Idol
content: West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee on Friday announced the construction of the world's tallest idol of the Mahakal avatar of Lord Shiva at the temple complex at Matigara in the north Bengal city of Siliguri.

title: Provident Fund Subscribers Can Withdraw Money Via UPI By April: Report
content: EPFO subscribers will be able to withdraw their employees' provident fund (EPF) directly to their bank accounts through UPI payment gateway by April this year, a top source has said.

title: Indian Stock Exchanges To Remain Open On Sunday For Union Budget 2026
content: Indian stock exchanges BSE and NSE on Friday announced that markets will be open for trading on February 1 (Sunday) on account of the Union Budget 2026-2027.

title: 'Zubeen Garg Was Intoxicated, But Made To Drink A Lot': Assam Cops On Motive
content: The Assam special investigation team (SIT) that is looking into the death of singer and cultural icon Zubeen Garg has announced similar findings as the police in Singapore, but has also added that there could have been a motive behind it.

title: Trump's New Tariff Threat, This Time Over Greenland
content: US President Donald Trump on Friday said that he may slap tariffs on countries that do not support his plans to take over Greenland.

title: 2 Arrested For Trying To Sell Child In Kolkata, 5-Year-Old Rescued: Cops
content: Delhi Police has rescued a five-year-old kidnapped boy and arrested two people, including a woman, for allegedly planning to sell the child in Kolkata, an official said on Thursday.

title: 3 Jaish Terrorist Hideouts Busted In Jammu And Kashmir's Kathua
content: In a significant counter-terrorism operation, three terrorist hideouts of the terror outfit, Jaish-e-Mohammad, were busted by police and other security forces in Jammu and Kashmir's Kathua district on Friday.

title: Ex-Air Force Staff Gets 20-Year Jail Term For Raping Daughter In Uttarakhand
content: A court in Dehradun has sentenced a former Air Force personnel to 20 years of rigorous imprisonment for raping his minor daughter.

title: Scientists call for climate‚Äëresilient model of irrigation and food production
content: The FPS underpinned by a 72% coal-based energy requirement has become one of India‚Äôs most carbon‚Äëintensive public support mechanisms, necessitating a fundamental rethink of groundwater‚Äëbased irrigation and a broader shift in cropping and dietary patterns to reduce emissions and build resilience

title: Kerala Kalolsavam 2026 | Yakshagana ignites festival with myth, muscle, and magic
content: Kannada folk theatre finds new admirers among Malayali audiences as students bring epic battles and boundless energy to the fest stage

title: Special Intensive Revision claims phase to end on January 18; more than 12.8 lakh electors seek inclusion in rolls
content: Due to the exercise, nearly 97.37 lakh of the State‚Äôs 6.41 crore electors were deleted, reducing the size of the electorate to 5.43 crore

title: One tourist drowned, another missing after stepping on thin ice in Arunachal lake
content: The search for the missing person had to be suspended due to fading light and harsh weather; it will resume on Saturday at 8 a.m

title: Tamil Nadu Congress leaders to meet AICC in Delhi today to discuss demand for power-sharing in the State
content: TNCC leaders claim that the DMK is prepared to allot more seats to the Congress than the 25 given in 2021, but has ruled out sharing power

title: What the civic body poll results mean for Maharashtra politics
content: The results show the likely power dynamics within the Mahayuti, and also raise questions on the future of the Maha Vikas Aghadi as a collective Opposition front

title: Fadnavis hails ‚Äòpeople‚Äôs trust‚Äô as Mahayuti leads Maharashtra polls
content: Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis on Thursday hailed the ‚Äúpeople‚Äôs trust‚Äù in the BJP‚ÄìShiv Sena Mahayuti after the alliance recorded a sweeping victory in Maharashtra‚Äôs civic body elections. The Mahayuti dominated polls across the State, including the high-profile Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation, and is set to form mayors in 25 of the 29 municipal corporations. Fadnavis attributed the strong mandate to the alliance‚Äôs development-focused governance agenda.

title: Congress slams U.P. govt over Manikarnika Ghat redevelopment, alleges damage to Varanasi‚Äôs heritage
content: The redevelopment project has triggered protests against a demolition drive at the ghat, with demonstrators alleging damage to a century-old idol of Lokmata Ahilyabai Holkar

title: Balasore lynching: Three persons arrested
content: The Odisha police have identified eight others who were present at the spot when the man was attacked

title: Maharashtra civic poll results: BJP emerges as top party in Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar, AIMIM in second place
content: While the BJP won 57 out of the 93 seats it contested, the Eknath Shinde-led Shiv Sena contested 96 seats but could win only 13 seats

title: An MGR film song that played often on Chief Minister Stalin‚Äôs car stereo
content: In Episode 2 of the #VibeWithMKS programme, he spent time with lyricists and musicians, listens to their performances, and answered their questions

title: A story of land, lives, and lores through the lens of a political activist
content: The exhibition at the College of Fine Arts in Thiruvananthapuram features photographs by Vijoo Krishnan, a Polit Bureau member of the CPI(M) and general secretary of the All India Kisan Sabha

title: ED seizes cash from premises of minor mineral mafias in Odisha
content: Premises searched belong to brokers, mafias, gangsters, local strongmen involved in illegal mining of sand, black stone, other minerals in Ganjam district, exploiting and terrorising residents, ED says

title: Diplomat‚Äôs meeting with Bangladesh Jamaat-e-Islami chief was routine: India
content: Ministry of External Affairs says interactions with political interlocutors in Dhaka are part of regular diplomatic engagement

title: Government raises the TDR offer to the plot owners in water bodies
content: Plots falling within the FTL or MFL will be compensated with 200% of the built up space equivalent the area  surrendered, and lands falling within buffer area will get 300% of the same, according to the new policy

title: Kerala Kalolsavam 2026 | Kannur in the lead, but familiar rivals follow closely
content: With two days left and packed halls celebrating folk and classical forms alike, the race for the Gold Cup promises another nail-biting finish this year as well

title: Chennai-based body calls for improvement of amenities at the Ambedkar Memorial
content: People‚Äôs Educational Trust, which works for the welfare of the Scheduled Castes, has appealed to the DMK to include, in its 2026 election manifesto, the issue of better maintenance of the memorial

title: High stakes and bloodshed as rooster fights defy State ban across districts
content: Makeshift arenas in Krishna and Godavari districts drew large crowds for illegal betting during Sankranti, with punters winning up to ‚Çπ1.5 crore in single bouts despite strict government prohibition

title: Three terrorist hideouts busted in Jammu: J&K Police
content: The police had recovered two M4 empty cartridges, one plastic box containing desi ghee, one polythene packet containing almonds, hand gloves, one cap, one blanket, one tarpaulin sheet, one small pouch and a polythene bag

title: Clear ‚Çπ3900 crore dues, reinforce confidence among investors, alcobev makers urge government
content: Ahead of State‚Äôs participation in WEF in Davos later this month, it is important existing contractual commitments are honoured, three associations of the companies say

content: Leader of Opposition  V.D. Satheesan criticises double standards in secular discourse, urges accountability for those spreading communal venom   Kerala Yatra organised by the Kerala Muslim Jamaat concludes in State capital

title: 1.03 crore new workers registered for ESIC after reforms: Labour Ministry
content: The scheme offers a one-time opportunity to register for ESI without concern for retrospective coverage or punitive action

title: 242 ‚Äòillegal betting and gambling‚Äô sites blocked
content: The blocking comes months after the real money gaming industry wound down its operations, leaving wagers to illegal and offshore operators, which move their URLs around to evade detection

content: People marched the streets after Friday prayers, expressing solidarity for the Iranian regime that‚Äôs facing criticism within the country and beyond

content: School performers bring medieval epics and biblical drama alive on stage with precision, power, and youthful passion
